column2: The data for series Dh323 ? 326 are for the calendar year.  Other series are for fiscal years ending as follows: September 30 for 1820 ? 1831 and 1843 ? 1849; December 31 for 1832 ? 1842 and 1850 ? 1865; and June 30 for 1866 ? 1970.
The figures are not strictly tourists, as they include commercial travelers.
Fifteen months ending December 31 of the year indicated.
Includes some number of Chinese returning through the port of San Francisco.
